1224319899288117550.NAME: You can't be in here, %PCRace. And I'm afraid I can't let you leave. The Company wouldn't like that at all.

5532282632337618941.NAME: You can't be in here, %PCRace. And I'm afraid I can't let you leave. The Company wouldn't like that at all.

227322281661726892.NAME: What are you doing! We'll let your actions go for now, but once you're released, stuff like that will get you arrested again.

7817111001232614388.NAME: You say you've been attacked by assassins? From your description, and the look of that dart you found, it sounds like the work of the Dark Brotherhood. I'm not sure who you angered, but stay away from me. I suppose this should be officially reported, though. Speak to Apelles Matius in Ebonheart about this matter.

16043312532573123088.NAME: You say you've been attacked by assassins? From your description, it sounds like the work of the Dark Brotherhood. I'm not sure who you angered, but stay away from me. I suppose this should be officially reported, though. Speak to Apelles Matius in Ebonheart about this matter.

27638249131682119725.NAME: I did not wish this upon you, Blodskaal, but you leave me little choice.

2022623305278403449.NAME: I accept the gold for the Skaal people. It will be added to the coffers of the village. Take care, Blodskaal. Do not let this become a habit.

14685265822458631302.NAME: You have violated laws of the Skaal. Though you have been named Blodskaal, you are also known to be under the shadow of the beast. You must pay with your life.

169222124924501314.NAME: You have violated laws of the Skaal. Though you have been named Blodskaal, you have no means to pay reparations to the Skaal. You must pay with your life.

4445282811792129285.NAME: You have violated laws of the Skaal. You have been named Blodskaal, so you are offered a choice: pay %PCCrimeLevel in reparations to the Skaal or pay with your life.

6534313421794514813.NAME: You have violated laws of the Skaal. As you are not of our people, you will pay for your crimes.
